## Open-source toolbox for Change Analysis using Landsat images

- [BfastSpatial package for R](https://github.com/dutri001/bfastSpatial)

The package can be installed directly in R from github using the `devtools` package:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github('dutri001/bfastSpatial')
```
